'''Vournoth''' was a [[lich]] that laired in a stagnant intersection in the [[Deep Wastes]] that became known as [[Vournoth's Mire]].
document_data.Personality: Vournoth had become well-known enough in the vicinity of [[Maerimydra]] that the [[lich]]'s name was attributed to the [[Vournoth's Mire|mire]] it resided in.
document_data.Abilities: The powers and abilities of a [[lich]], like Vournoth, meant the creature was highly resistant to ordinary attacks and could paralyze foes with but a touch. Vournoth was considered dangerous enough by the [[drow]] of Maerimydra that they sent a champion out to face the lich.
document_data.Possessions: A notable lich, Vournoth at one time had a [[phylactery]] that allowed the lich to reform after defeat.
